title: I'm watching Trump's speech, and honestly, I think he's the right choice for us
body:
He said a couple stupid things, but this man knows what needs to happen.
He probably won't win because he's basically the polar opposite of the average delusional hipster liberal, and the delusional liberals are the majority. And that's unfortunate.
This man really would be the right choice lol. No more being China's bitch, no more fucking around for no reason, taking control of what we need, and pushing ahead of all the other countries as we should. But nah, we'll vote for another delusional hipster to keep us way low in the international lists.
